name: Slug Cave
description:
SLUG CAVE 

Your family has left, all that remains are several purple artifacts.
Explore your procedurally generated cave home to find the artifacts and win the game.

Gameplay:

Stepping on lava blocks will decrease your view window until you die.

Stepping on gold blocks will increase your view window, giving you more time to stay alive.

Collect 3 purple artifact blocks left behind by your slug family to win the game!

Controls: 

W: move up

A: move left

S: move down

D: move right

P: skip to next song

ESC: quit the game

A game made in pygame for the #KSUGameJam
